com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map

Interface MapDisplayEvents

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tickable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapDisplay, MapTestDisplay, MapWidget, MapWidgetButton, MapWidgetRoot, MapWidgetTabView, MapWidgetTabView.Tab, MapWidgetText, MapWidgetWindow

    public interface MapDisplayEvents
extends Tickable
    An interface of all possible event callback methods provided by Map Displays and Map Display Controls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAttached()
      Called right after this Map Display is bound to a plugin and map
      void onDetached()
      Called right before the map display is removed after the session ends
      void onKey(MapKeyEvent event)
      Callback function called every tick while a key is pressed down.
      void onKeyPressed(MapKeyEvent event)
      Callback function called when a key changed from not-pressed to pressed down These callbacks are called before onTick().
      void onKeyReleased(MapKeyEvent event)
      Callback function called when a key changed from pressed to not pressed down These callbacks are called before onTick().
      void onLeftClick(MapClickEvent event)
      Callback function called when a player left-clicks the map held in an item frame showing this Map Display.
      void onMapItemChanged()
      Callback function called when the map item of this Map Display changed
      void onRightClick(MapClickEvent event)
      Callback function called when a player right-clicks the map held in an item frame showing this Map Display.
      void onStatusChanged(MapStatusEvent event)
      Callback function called when a widget in the map display wishes to broadcast a status change.
      void onTick()
      Fired every tick to update this Virtual Map.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttached

        void onAttached()
        Called right after this Map Display is bound to a plugin and map

      • onDetached

        void onDetached()
        Called right before the map display is removed after the session ends

      • onTick

        void onTick()
        Fired every tick to update this Virtual Map. This method can be overridden to dynamically update the map continuously. To optimize performance, only draw things in the map when they change.
        Specified by:
        onTick in interface Tickable

      • onKey

        void onKey(MapKeyEvent event)
        Callback function called every tick while a key is pressed down. These callbacks are called before onTick().
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onKeyPressed

        void onKeyPressed(MapKeyEvent event)
        Callback function called when a key changed from not-pressed to pressed down These callbacks are called before onTick().
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onKeyReleased

        void onKeyReleased(MapKeyEvent event)
        Callback function called when a key changed from pressed to not pressed down These callbacks are called before onTick().
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onLeftClick

        void onLeftClick(MapClickEvent event)
        Callback function called when a player left-clicks the map held in an item frame showing this Map Display.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onRightClick

        void onRightClick(MapClickEvent event)
        Callback function called when a player right-clicks the map held in an item frame showing this Map Display.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onMapItemChanged

        void onMapItemChanged()
        Callback function called when the map item of this Map Display changed

      • onStatusChanged

        void onStatusChanged(MapStatusEvent event)
        Callback function called when a widget in the map display wishes to broadcast a status change. These status changes can be used to refresh the map or apply updated configurations.
        Parameters:
        event - of the status change
